arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund ease past 10-man Heidenheim to maintain perfect start
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund's perfect beginning to the new Bundesliga season continued at Heidenheim, with Serhou Guirassy and Maxi Beier netting the first-half goals to see off a Heidenheim side who were reduced to 10 men following Budu Zivzivadze's straight red card. An early blow for Heidenheim as Leart Paqarada was forced off with what appeared to be a serious knee injury just seven minutes into the match.
Borussia Dortmund go top of the Bundesliga – with Bayern Munich playing in the Topspiel – with goals from Serhou Guirassy and Maximilian Beier securing a 2-0 win for die…

arts.ttl: Dortmund dispatch 10-men Heidenheim in comfortable fashion
arts.sum: Die Schwarzgelben ran out comfortable 2-0 winners against the 10-men of 1.FC Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund XI vs FC Heidenheim – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: FC Heidenheim will host Borussia Dortmund in a Bundesliga clash on Saturday afternoon. The two teams come into this match with very different recent performances. Heidenheim are still chasing their first points of the season, struggling to find form, while Dortmund look to continue their strong start in the 2025/26 campaign. arts.ttl: FC Heidenheim vs Borussia Dortmund – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: FC Heidenheim and Borussia Dortmund go head-to-head in the Bundesliga on Saturday afternoon. Both sides enter this encounter in contrasting form, with the hosts desperately seeking their first points of the campaign while the visitors look to build on their promising start to the 2025/26 season. arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: Schwarzgelben look for first three points on the road
arts.sum: Heidenheim host Borussia Dortmund this weekend, and the visitors are looking to capitalise on Heidenheim’s poor form to take their first three points away from home this season.
